concept.description: Creates an IMPORTS relation from a bundle artifact to all packages which are declared as "Import-Package" in the bundle manifest.
concept.cypher: match (package:Package) with package, "(^|.*,)\\s*"+ replace(package.fqn, ".", "\\.")+"\\s*((;|,).*|$)" as pattern match (bundle:Osgi:Bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(manifest:File:Manifest), (manifest)-[:DECLARES]->(section:ManifestSection), (section)-[:HAS]->(entry:ManifestEntry) where entry.name = "Import-Package" and entry.value =~ pattern create unique (bundle)-[:IMPORTS]->(package) return bundle as Bundle, collect(package) as ImportedPackages

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.MessageDriven with "Ejb" and "MessageDriven".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.MessageDriven" SET t:Ejb:MessageDriven RETURN t AS MessageDrivenBean

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.persistence.Entity with "Jpa" and "Entity".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.persistence.Entity" SET t:Jpa:Entity RETURN t AS JpaEntity

concept.description: Labels all classes annotated with @Model as "Model".
concept.cypher: MATCH (modelClass:Type:Class)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(modelAnnotationType:Type) WHERE modelAnnotationType.fqn = "com.buschmais.jqassistant.examples.rules.naming.Model" SET modelClass:Model RETURN modelClass AS ModelClass

concept.description: Creates an ACTIVATES relation between a class and the bundle artifact if the class is declared as "Bundle-Activator" in the bundle manifest.
concept.cypher: match (bundle:Osgi:Bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(manifest:File:Manifest), (manifest)-[:DECLARES]->(section:ManifestSection), (section)-[:HAS]->(entry:ManifestEntry), (bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(activator:Class) where entry.name = "Bundle-Activator" and entry.value = activator.fqn create unique (activator)-[:ACTIVATES]->(bundle) return activator as Activator, bundle as Bundle

concept.description: Labels all non-abstract classes extending from junit.framework.TestCase "Test" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:EXTENDS*]->(testCaseType:Type) WHERE testCaseType.fqn = "junit.framework.TestCase" SET c:Test:Junit3 RETURN c AS TestClass

concept.description: View blabla
concept.cypher: match (n) return n;

concept.description: Finds resource methods annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.PUT" and labels them with 'PutResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.PUT" SET m:PutResourceMethod RETURN m AS PutMethod

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding the number of other types they depend on.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency:Type) RETURN t.fqn as Type, COUNT(dependency) as Dependencies ORDER BY Dependencies DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Stateful with "Ejb" and "Stateful".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Stateful" SET t:Ejb:Stateful RETURN t AS StatefulEjb

concept.description: Labels functional interfaces (i.e. to be used as lambda expressions) with "FunctionalInterface".
concept.cypher: MATCH (functionalInterface:Interface)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(functionalInterfaceType) WHERE functionalInterfaceType.fqn = 'java.lang.FunctionalInterface' SET functionalInterface:FunctionalInterface RETURN functionalInterface AS FunctionalInterface

concept.description: Finds classes that implement "javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper" and labels them with 'JaxRS' and 'ExceptionMappingProvider'
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.ext.ExceptionMapper" SET c:JaxRS:ExceptionMappingProvider RETURN DISTINCT c AS ExceptionMappingProvider

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped with "Cdi" and "ConversationScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.context.ConversationScoped" SET e:Cdi:ConversationScoped RETURN e AS ConversationScopedElement

concept.description: Finds all test methods (i.e. annotated with "@org.junit.Test") and labels them with "Test" and "Junit4".
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.junit.Test" SET m:Test:Junit4 RETURN m AS Test

concept.description: Creates a DEPENDS_ON relationship between artifacts if there are type dependencies between them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (a1:Artifact)-[:REQUIRES]->(t1:Type), (a2:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]-(t2:Type) WHERE t1.fqn=t2.fqn CREATE UNIQUE (a1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(a2) RETURN a1 AS Artifact, COLLECT(DISTINCT a2.name) AS Dependencies

concept.description: Labels all tearDown methods declared by a test class with "TearDown" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class:Test:Junit3)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) WHERE m.signature = "void tearDown()" SET m:TearDown:Junit3 RETURN m AS TearDownMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels the package "org.jqassistant.demo.usermanagement" as "Module" and "UserManagement".
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Package) WHERE m.fqn="org.jqassistant.demo.usermanagement" SET m:Module:UserManagement RETURN m.fqn as Module

concept.description: Finds classes or interfaces with atleast one method annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.Path" or with request method designator (i.e. @GET, @POST, @PUT, @DELETE, @HEAD, @OPTIONS) and labels them with 'JaxRS' and 'Resource'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE (a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator OR a.fqn="javax.ws.rs.Path") AND (t:Class OR t:Interface) SET t:JaxRS:Resource RETURN DISTINCT t AS RestResource

concept.description: Creates a relation IMPLEMENTED_BY between all test cases from test reports and their implementing methods.
concept.cypher: MATCH (testcase:TestCase) WITH testcase MATCH (testclass:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(testmethod:Method) WHERE testclass.fqn = testcase.className and testmethod.name = testcase.name CREATE UNIQUE (testcase)-[:IMPLEMENTED_BY]->(testmethod) RETURN testcase AS TestCase

concept.description: Labels types deriving from java.lang.Exception as "Exception".
concept.cypher: MATCH (exception)-[:EXTENDS*]->(t:Type) WHERE t.fqn = 'java.lang.Exception' SET exception:Exception RETURN exception AS Exception

concept.description: Labels all fields annotated annotated by @javax.decorator.Delegate with "Decorator" and "Delegate".
concept.cypher: MATCH (delegate:Field)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(delegateType:Type) WHERE delegateType.fqn="javax.decorator.Delegate" SET delegate:Decorator:Delegate RETURN delegate AS Delegate

concept.description: Returns the top 10 artifacts regarding the number of contained types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Artifact:File)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:Type:File) RETURN a.fqn as Artifact, COUNT(t) as Types ORDER BY Types DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Finds test methods (i.e. annotated with "@org.junit.Test") and labels them and their containing classes with "Test" and "Junit4".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method:Junit4:Test) RETURN c AS TestClass, COLLECT(m) AS TestMethods

concept.description: Labels all classes implementing the Controller interface as "Controller".
concept.cypher: MATCH (controllerClass:Type:Class)-[:IMPLEMENTS*]->(controllerType:Type) WHERE controllerType.fqn = "com.buschmais.jqassistant.examples.rules.naming.Controller" SET controllerClass:Controller RETURN controllerClass

concept.description: Finds resource methods annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.GET" and labels them with 'GetResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.GET" SET m:GetResourceMethod RETURN m AS GetMethod

concept.description: Äppel sind oko
concept.cypher: match (n)-[r:appel]-(m) return n

concept.description: Finds classes that implement "javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver" and labels them with 'JaxRS' and 'ContextProvider'
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.ext.ContextResolver" SET c:JaxRS:ContextProvider RETURN DISTINCT c AS ContextProvider

concept.description: Labels all internal types (i.e. which are not located in an exported package) as "Internal".
concept.cypher: match (bundle:Bundle:Osgi)-[:CONTAINS]->(internalPackage:Package), (bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(internalType:Type), (internalPackage)-[:CONTAINS]->(internalType:Type) where not (bundle)-[:EXPORTS]->(internalPackage) set internalType:Internal return bundle as Bundle, collect(internalType) as InternalTypes

concept.description: Sets a label "Anonymous" on anonymous inner types, i.e. types without a name.
concept.cypher: MATCH (innerType:Inner:Type) WHERE innerType.name =~ ".*\\$[0-9]*" SET innerType:Anonymous RETURN innerType AS AnonymousInnerType

concept.description: Labels default methods of interfaces with "Default".
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type:Interface)-[:DECLARES]->(defaultMethod:Method) WHERE NOT has(defaultMethod.abstract) SET defaultMethod:Default RETURN defaultMethod AS DefaultMethod, type AS Interface

concept.description: Labels all beans declaring method that has parameter of type "javax.enterprise.event.Observes" with "Cdi" and "EventConsumer".
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Method)-[:HAS]->(param:Parameter), (param)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE injectType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.event.Observes" SET a:Cdi:EventConsumer RETURN DISTINCT a.fqn AS cdiEventConsumer

concept.description: Creates a DEPENDS_ON relationship between a packages if there are type dependencies between them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p1:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(t1:Type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(t2:Type)<-[:CONTAINS]-(p2:Package) WHERE p1<>p2 CREATE UNIQUE (p1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2) RETURN p1 AS package, COUNT(DISTINCT p2) AS PackageDependencyCount

concept.description: zuviel Zucker ist schlecht
concept.cypher: match (n)-[r]-(m:zucker) return n

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.context.SessionScoped with "Cdi" and "SessionScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.context.SessionScoped" SET e:Cdi:SessionScoped RETURN e AS SessionScopedElement

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.context.RequestScoped with "Cdi" and "RequestScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.context.RequestScoped" SET e:Cdi:RequestScoped RETURN e AS RequestScopedElement

concept.description: Labels all classes containing test methods with "Test" and "Junit4".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method:Junit4:Test) SET c:Test:Junit4 RETURN c AS TestClass, COLLECT(m) AS TestMethods

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.junit.BeforeClass" with "Junit4" and "BeforeClass".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.junit.BeforeClass" SET m:Junit4:BeforeClass RETURN m AS BeforeClassMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all types annotated by @javax.decorator.Decorator with "Decorator".
concept.cypher: MATCH (decorator:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(decoratorType:Type) WHERE decoratorType.fqn="javax.decorator.Decorator" SET decorator:Decorator RETURN decorator AS Decorator

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.testng.annotations.BeforeMethod" with "TestNG" and "BeforeMethod".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.BeforeMethod" SET m:TestNG:BeforeMethod RETURN m AS BeforeMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Creates an EXPORTS relation from a bundle artifact to all packages which are declared as "Export-Package" in the bundle manifest.
concept.cypher: match (bundle:Osgi:Bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(package:Package) with bundle, package, "(^|.*,)\\s*"+ replace(package.fqn, ".", "\\.")+"\\s*((;|,).*|$)" as pattern match (bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(manifest:File:Manifest), (manifest)-[:DECLARES]->(section:ManifestSection), (section)-[:HAS]->(entry:ManifestEntry) where entry.name = "Export-Package" AND entry.value=~ pattern create unique (bundle)-[:EXPORTS]->(package) return bundle as Bundle, collect(package) as ExportedPackages

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.testng.annotations.AfterMethod" with "TestNG" and "AfterMethod".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.AfterMethod" SET m:TestNG:AfterMethod RETURN m AS AfterMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Creates a relation DISPOSES between a parameter and its type if the parameter is annotated by @javax.enterprise.inject.Disposes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(disposeMethod:Method)-[:HAS]->(parameter:Parameter), (parameter)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(disposesType:Type), (parameter)-[:OF_TYPE]->(type) WHERE disposesType.fqn="javax.enterprise.inject.Disposes" CREATE UNIQUE (parameter)-[:DISPOSES]->(type) RETURN disposeMethod AS DisposeMethod

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding the number of other types depending on them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File)<-[:DEPENDS_ON]-(dependent:Type) RETURN t.fqn as Type, COUNT(dependent) as Dependents ORDER BY Dependents DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.testng.annotations.AfterTest" with "TestNG" and "AfterTestMethod".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.AfterTest" SET m:TestNG:AfterTestMethod RETURN m AS AfterTestMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels types deriving from java.lang.RuntimeException as "RuntimeException".
concept.cypher: MATCH (runtimeException)-[:EXTENDS*]->(t:Type) WHERE t.fqn = 'java.lang.RuntimeException' SET runtimeException:RuntimeException RETURN runtimeException AS RuntimeException

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass" with "TestNG" and "BeforeClassMethod".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.BeforeClass" SET m:TestNG:BeforeClassMethod RETURN m AS BeforeClassMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels types deriving from java.lang.Error as "Error".
concept.cypher: MATCH (throwable)-[:EXTENDS*]->(t:Type) WHERE t.fqn = 'java.lang.Error' SET throwable:Error RETURN throwable AS Error

concept.description: Creates a relationship OVERRIDES between two "Method" labeled nodes if one method overrides another one from a super type (i.e. the methods have the same signature).
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method), (superType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(otherMethod:Method), (superType)-[:ASSIGNABLE_FROM]->(type) WHERE method.name = otherMethod.name AND method.signature = otherMethod.signature AND method.visibility <> 'private' CREATE UNIQUE (method)-[:OVERRIDES]->(otherMethod) RETURN method AS OverriddenMethod, type AS DeclaringType, superType AS SuperType

concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated with @javax.persistence.Embedded with "Jpa" and "Embedded".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and a.fqn="javax.persistence.Embedded" SET member:Jpa:Embedded RETURN member AS JpaEmbedded

concept.description: Labels all elements annotated by "javax.enterprise.inject.Any" with "Cdi" and "Any".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(anyType:Type) WHERE anyType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.inject.Any" SET e:Cdi:Any RETURN e AS Any

concept.description: Labels all fields annotated annotated by @javax.decorator.Delegate with "Cdi" and "Delegate".
concept.cypher: MATCH (delegate:Field)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(delegateType:Type) WHERE delegateType.fqn="javax.decorator.Delegate" SET delegate:Cdi:Delegate RETURN delegate AS Delegate

concept.description: Labels all types annotated by @javax.decorator.Decorator with "Cdi" and "Decorator".
concept.cypher: MATCH (decorator:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(decoratorType:Type) WHERE decoratorType.fqn="javax.decorator.Decorator" SET decorator:Cdi:Decorator RETURN decorator AS Decorator

concept.description: Returns all defined modules.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Package:Module) RETURN m.fqn as Module

concept.description: Control blabla
concept.cypher: match (z) return n;

concept.description: Labels types deriving from java.lang.Throwable as "Throwable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (throwable)-[:EXTENDS*]->(t:Type) WHERE t.fqn = 'java.lang.Throwable' SET throwable:Throwable RETURN throwable AS Throwable

concept.description: Labels all classes or methods annotated with "@org.junit.Ignore" with "Junit4" and "Ignore".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.junit.Ignore" SET e:Junit4:Ignore RETURN e AS IgnoredElement

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.context.Dependent with "Cdi" and "Dependent".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.context.Dependent" SET e:Cdi:Dependent RETURN e AS DependentElement

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.junit.Before" with "Junit4" and "Before".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.junit.Before" SET m:Junit4:Before RETURN m AS BeforeMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all elements annotated by "javax.enterprise.inject.Default" with "Cdi" and "Default".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(defaultType:Type) WHERE defaultType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.inject.Default" SET e:Cdi:Default RETURN e AS Default

concept.description: Labels all annotations annotated by "javax.interceptor.InterceptorBinding" with "Interceptor" and "Binding".
concept.cypher: MATCH (binding:Type:Annotation)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(bindingType:Type) WHERE bindingType.fqn = "javax.interceptor.InterceptorBinding" SET binding:Interceptor:Binding RETURN binding AS InterceptorBinding

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Remote with "Ejb" and "Remote".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Remote" SET t:Ejb:Remote RETURN t AS RemoteBean

concept.description: Creates a node labeled with "Jpa" and "NamedQuery" for each @NamedQuery defined for an entity. Furthermore a relation DEFINES is created between the entity and the named query.
concept.cypher: MATCH (entity:Jpa:Entity)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(namedQueries)-[:OF_TYPE]->(namedQueriesType:Type), (namedQueries)-[:HAS]->(:Value:Array)-[:CONTAINS]->(namedQuery:Value:Annotation)-[:OF_TYPE]->(namedQueryType:Type), (namedQuery)-[:HAS]->(nameAttribute:Value), (namedQuery)-[:HAS]->(queryAttribute:Value) WHERE namedQueriesType.fqn = 'javax.persistence.NamedQueries' and namedQueryType.fqn = 'javax.persistence.NamedQuery' and nameAttribute.name = 'name' and queryAttribute.name = 'query' CREATE UNIQUE (entity)-[:DEFINES]->(n:Jpa:NamedQuery {name:nameAttribute.value, query:queryAttribute.value}) RETURN entity AS Entity, n.name AS Name, n.query AS Query

concept.description: Propagates INVOKES relationships to methods which implement or override the invoked method.
concept.cypher: MATCH (method:Method)-[:INVOKES]->(invokedMethod:Method), (overridingMethod:Method)-[:OVERRIDES]->(invokedMethod) CREATE UNIQUE (method)-[r:INVOKES]->(overridingMethod) RETURN r AS OverridingInvocation

concept.description: Finds resource methods annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.DELETE" and labels them with 'DeleteResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.DELETE" SET m:DeleteResourceMethod RETURN m AS DeleteMethod

concept.description: Creates a relationship OVERLOADS between two "Method" labeled nodes if one method overloads another one from the same type (i.e. the methods have the same name but not the same signature).
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method), (type)-[:DECLARES]->(otherMethod:Method) WHERE method <> otherMethod AND method.name = otherMethod.name AND method.signature <> otherMethod.signature CREATE UNIQUE (method)-[:OVERLOADS]->(otherMethod) RETURN method AS OverloadedMethod, type AS DeclaringType

concept.description: Creates a relation PRODUCES between a field and its type or a method and its return type if the parameter is annotated by @javax.enterprise.inject.Disposes.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:OF_TYPE|RETURNS]->(type), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(producesType:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and producesType.fqn="javax.enterprise.inject.Produces" CREATE UNIQUE (member)-[:PRODUCES]->(type) RETURN member AS Producer

concept.description: Finds classes that implement "javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader" or "javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter" and labels them with 'JaxRS' and 'EntityProvider'
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn IN ["javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader", "javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter"] SET c:JaxRS:EntityProvider RETURN DISTINCT c AS EntityProvider

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.junit.AfterClass" with "Junit4" and "AfterClass".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.junit.AfterClass" SET m:Junit4:AfterClass RETURN m AS AfterClassMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Finds methods that belong to resource class or interface and annotated with request method designator (i.e. @GET, @POST, @PUT, @DELETE, @HEAD, @OPTIONS) and labels them with 'JaxRS' and 'ResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:JaxRS:Resource)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) SET m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod RETURN m AS ResourceMethod

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.testng.annotations.AfterClass" with "TestNG" and "AfterClassMethod".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.AfterClass" SET m:TestNG:AfterClassMethod RETURN m AS AfterClassMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all test methods declared by a test class with "Test" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class:Test:Junit3)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) WHERE m.signature =~ "void test.*\\(.*\\)" SET m:Test:Junit3 RETURN m AS Test, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.junit.After" with "Junit4" and "After".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.junit.After" SET m:Junit4:After RETURN m AS AfterMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all annotation types annotated by @javax.inject.Qualifier with "Cdi" and "Qualifier" and adds the labels "Cdi" and "Nonbinding" to all non-binding annotation values (i.e. which are annotated by @javax.enterprise.util.Nonbinding).
concept.cypher: MATCH (qualifier:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(qualifierType:Type) WHERE qualifierType.fqn = "javax.inject.Qualifier" SET qualifier:Cdi:Qualifier WITH qualifier MATCH (qualifier)-[:DECLARES]->(attribute:Method), (attribute)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(nonbindingType:Type) WHERE nonbindingType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.util.Nonbinding" SET attribute:Cdi:Nonbinding RETURN distinct qualifier AS Qualifier

concept.description: Labels all classes annotated with @javax.ejb.Singleton with "Ejb" and "Singleton".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Singleton" SET t:Ejb:Singleton RETURN t AS SingletonEjb

concept.description: Sets a label "Inner" on inner types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(innerType:Type) SET innerType:Inner RETURN innerType AS InnerType

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.persistence.Embeddable with "Jpa" and "Embeddable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.persistence.Embeddable" SET t:Jpa:Embeddable RETURN t AS JpaEmbeddable

concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated by @javax.inject.Inject with "Cdi" and "InjectionPoint".
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and injectType.fqn="javax.inject.Inject" SET member:Cdi:InjectionPoint RETURN member AS InjectionPoint

concept.description: Finds classes or interfaces with method annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.Path" but no request method designator and no entity parameters and labels the methods with 'JaxRS' and 'SubResourceLocator'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.Path" AND (t:Class OR t:Interface) AND NOT (m)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) AND (m)-[:HAS]->(:Parameter)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type) SET m:JaxRS:SubResourceLocator RETURN DISTINCT m AS RestSubResourceLocator

concept.description: Finds all test methods (i.e. annotated with "@org.testng.annotations.Test") and labels them with "Test" and "TestNG".
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.Test" SET m:Test:TestNG RETURN m AS Test

concept.description: Finds resource methods annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.HEAD" and labels them with 'HeadResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.HEAD" SET m:HeadResourceMethod RETURN m AS HeadMethod

concept.description: Finds request method designator annotations (i.e. @GET, @POST, @PUT, @DELETE, @HEAD, @OPTIONS) and labels them with 'JaxRS' and 'RequestMethodDesignator'
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type) WHERE a.fqn IN ["javax.ws.rs.GET", "javax.ws.rs.POST", "javax.ws.rs.PUT", "javax.ws.rs.DELETE", "javax.ws.rs.HEAD", "javax.ws.rs.OPTIONS"] SET a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator RETURN a AS RequestMethodDesignator

concept.description: Labels all types annotated by @javax.enterprise.inject.Alternative with "Cdi" and "Alternative".
concept.cypher: MATCH (alternative:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(alternativeType:Type) WHERE alternativeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.inject.Alternative" SET alternative:Cdi:Alternative RETURN alternative AS Alternative

concept.description: Labels all assertion methods declared by org.junit.Assert with "Junit4" and "Assert".
concept.cypher: MATCH (assertType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(assertMethod) WHERE assertType.fqn = 'org.junit.Assert' and assertMethod.signature =~ 'void assert.*' SET assertMethod:Junit4:Assert RETURN assertMethod

concept.description: Labels all beans annotated by @javax.inject.Singleton with "Cdi" and "SingletonScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.inject.Singleton" SET t:Cdi:SingletonScoped RETURN t AS cdiSingleton

concept.description: Labels all nodes representing deprecated elements (types, fields, methods, packages or parameters) with "Deprecated".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(dt:Type) WHERE dt.fqn='java.lang.Deprecated' SET e:Deprecated RETURN e AS DeprecatedElement

concept.description: Labels all beans declaring "InjectionPoint" of type "javax.enterprise.event.Event" with "Cdi" and "EventProducer".
concept.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Field:Cdi:InjectionPoint), (member)-[:OF_TYPE]->(injectType:Type) WHERE injectType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.event.Event" SET a:Cdi:EventProducer RETURN DISTINCT a.fqn AS cdiEventProducers

concept.description: Labels the package "org.jqassistant.demo.dataimport" as "Module" and "DataImport".
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Package) WHERE m.fqn="org.jqassistant.demo.dataimport" SET m:Module:DataImport RETURN m.fqn as Module

concept.description: Labels all classes annotated by "javax.interceptor.Interceptor" with "Interceptor".
concept.cypher: MATCH (interceptor:Type:Class)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(interceptorType:Type) WHERE interceptorType.fqn = "javax.interceptor.Interceptor" SET interceptor:Interceptor RETURN interceptor AS Interceptor

concept.description: Labels all setUp methods declared by a test class with "SetUp" and "Junit3".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Class:Test:Junit3)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) WHERE m.signature = "void setUp()" SET m:SetUp:Junit3 RETURN m AS SetUpMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Labels all beans, fields or methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped with "Cdi" and "ApplicationScoped".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(scopeType:Type) WHERE (e:Type or e:Method or e:Field) and scopeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped" SET e:Cdi:ApplicationScoped RETURN e AS ApplicationScopedElement

concept.description: Labels all types or methods annotated by "javax.inject.Named" with "Cdi" and "Named".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(namedType:Type) WHERE namedType.fqn = "javax.inject.Named" SET e:Cdi:Named RETURN e AS Named

concept.description: Finds resource methods annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.OPTIONS" and labels them with 'OptionsResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.OPTIONS" SET m:OptionsResourceMethod RETURN m AS OptionsMethod

concept.description: Returns the top 10 packages regarding the number of contained types.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p:Package:File)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:Type:File) RETURN p.fqn as Package, COUNT(t) as Types ORDER BY Types DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Labels all annotation types annotated by @javax.enterprise.inject.Stereotype with "Cdi" and "Stereotype".
concept.cypher: MATCH (stereotype:Type:Annotation)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(stereotypeType:Type) WHERE stereotypeType.fqn="javax.enterprise.inject.Stereotype" SET stereotype:Cdi:Stereotype RETURN stereotype AS Stereotype

concept.description: blubbblubb
concept.cypher: match (n)-[r]-() set r=n

concept.description: Labels all types and methods annotated by @javax.enterprise.inject.Specializes with "Cdi" and "Specializes".
concept.cypher: MATCH (specializes)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(specializesType:Type) WHERE (specializes:Type or specializes:Method) and specializesType.fqn="javax.enterprise.inject.Specializes" SET specializes:Cdi:Specializes RETURN specializes AS Specialization

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Stateless with "Ejb" and "Stateless".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Stateless" SET t:Ejb:Stateless RETURN t AS StatelessEjb

concept.description: Labels all methods annotated by "@org.testng.annotations.BeforeTest" with "TestNG" and "BeforeTestMethod".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method), (m:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="org.testng.annotations.BeforeTest" SET m:TestNG:BeforeTestMethod RETURN m AS BeforeTestMethod, c AS TestClass

concept.description: Finds resource methods annotated with "@javax.ws.rs.POST" and labels them with 'PostResourceMethod'.
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:JaxRS:ResourceMethod)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]-()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:JaxRS:RequestMethodDesignator) WHERE a.fqn = "javax.ws.rs.POST" SET m:PostResourceMethod RETURN m AS PostMethod

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding to the number of declared methods (including constructors).
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method) RETURN t.fqn as Type, COUNT(m) as MethodCount ORDER BY MethodCount DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Labels the package "org.jqassistant.demo.shoppingcart" as "Module" and "ShoppingCart".
concept.cypher: MATCH (m:Package) WHERE m.fqn="org.jqassistant.demo.shoppingcart" SET m:Module:ShoppingCart RETURN m.fqn as Module

concept.description: Creates a relationship ASSIGNABLE_FROM between two "Type" labeled nodes if one type is assignable from the other (i.e. a super class or interface).
concept.cypher: MATCH (type:Type) CREATE UNIQUE (type)-[:ASSIGNABLE_FROM]->(type) WITH type MATCH (type)-[:IMPLEMENTS|EXTENDS*]->(superType:Type) CREATE UNIQUE (superType)-[:ASSIGNABLE_FROM]->(type) RETURN type AS AssignableType, superType AS AssignableFrom

concept.description: Returns the top 10 types regarding to the number of declared fields.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File)-[:DECLARES]->(f:Field) RETURN t.fqn as Type, COUNT(f) as FieldCount ORDER BY FieldCount DESC LIMIT 10

concept.description: Labels all classes containing test methods with "Test" and "TestNG".
concept.cypher: MATCH (c:Type:Class)-[:DECLARES]->(m:Method:TestNG:Test) SET c:Test:TestNG RETURN c AS TestClass, COLLECT(m) AS TestMethods

concept.description: Labels all elements annotated by "javax.enterprise.inject.New" with "Cdi" and "New".
concept.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(newType:Type) WHERE newType.fqn = "javax.enterprise.inject.New" SET e:Cdi:New RETURN e AS New

concept.description: Labels all artifacts with a manifest declaring a bundle name as "Osgi" and "Bundle" and adds the properties "bundleSymbolicName" and "bundleVersion".
concept.cypher: MATCH (bundle:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(manifest:Manifest:File), (manifest)-[DECLARES]->(section:ManifestSection), (section)-[:HAS]->(nameEntry:ManifestEntry), (section)-[:HAS]->(versionEntry:ManifestEntry) WHERE nameEntry.name = "Bundle-SymbolicName" AND versionEntry.name = "Bundle-Version" SET bundle:Osgi:Bundle, bundle.bundleSymbolicName = nameEntry.value, bundle.bundleVersion = versionEntry.value RETURN bundle as Bundle, bundle.bundleSymbolicName as BundleSymbolicName, bundle.bundleVersion as BundleVersion

concept.description: Labels all types annotated with @javax.ejb.Local with "Ejb" and "Local".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE a.fqn="javax.ejb.Local" SET t:Ejb:Local RETURN t AS LocalBean

concept.description: Labels all fields or methods annotated with @javax.persistence.EmbeddedId with "Jpa" and "Embedded".
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member), (member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(a:Type) WHERE (member:Field or member:Method) and a.fqn="javax.persistence.EmbeddedId" SET member:Jpa:EmbeddedId RETURN member AS EmbeddedId

constraint.description: All model classes must have a name suffix "Model".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (modelClass:Class:Model) WHERE NOT modelClass.name =~ ".*Model" RETURN modelClass AS ModelClass

constraint.description: All CDI beans must use constructor injection.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Cdi:InjectionPoint) WHERE NOT member:Constructor RETURN DISTINCT a.fqn AS invalidBean

constraint.description: There must be no cyclic artifact dependencies.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (a1:Artifact)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(a2:Artifact), path=shortestPath((a2)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(a1)) WHERE a1<>a2 RETURN a1 AS Artifact, EXTRACT(a IN nodes(path) | a.fqn) AS Cycle ORDER BY Artifact.fqn

constraint.description: All assertions must provide a message.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (testType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(testMethod:Method), (testMethod)-[invocation:INVOKES]->(assertMethod:Assert:Method) WHERE NOT assertMethod.signature =~ 'void assert.*\\(java.lang.String,.*\\)' RETURN invocation AS Invocation, testType AS DeclaringType, testMethod AS Method

constraint.description: CDI beans shall not use field injection (constructor and setter injections are fine.).
constraint.cypher: MATCH (a:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(member:Field:Cdi:InjectionPoint) RETURN DISTINCT a.fqn AS invalidBean

constraint.description: There must be no cyclic package dependencies.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p1:Package)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2:Package), path=shortestPath((p2)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(p1)) WHERE p1<>p2 RETURN p1 AS Package, EXTRACT(p IN nodes(path) | p.fqn) AS Cycle ORDER BY Package.fqn

constraint.description: All @Ignore annotations must provide a message.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (e)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(ignore:Annotation)-[:OF_TYPE]->(ignoreType:Type) WHERE ignoreType.fqn= "org.junit.Ignore" AND NOT (ignore)-[:HAS]->(:Value{name:"value"}) RETURN e AS IgnoreWithoutMessage

constraint.description: another desc
constraint.cypher: match (n:Component)<-[r:DEPENDSON]-(m:Component {refID:{1}})--(p:Project {name:{0}}) return n;

constraint.description: All direct sub-packages of "org.jqassistant.demo" must be defined as modules.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (root:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(m:Package) WHERE root.fqn="org.jqassistant.demo" AND NOT ( m:Module ) RETURN m.fqn as UndefinedModule

constraint.description: If a parent Maven project declares a module then the parent project must also be declared as the parent of the module (i.e. to keep the project hierarchy consistent).
constraint.cypher: match (parent:Maven:Project)-[:HAS_MODULE]->(module:Maven:Project) where not (module)-[:HAS_PARENT]->(parent) return module as InvalidModule

constraint.description: The validation mode of all persistence units must be explicitly specified and either set to CALLBACK or NONE.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (pu:PersistenceUnit) WHERE not has(pu.validationMode) OR NOT ( pu.validationMode='CALLBACK' OR pu.validationMode='NONE' ) RETURN pu AS PersistenceUnit

constraint.description: All model classes must be located in the package "model".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS]->(modelClass:Class:Model) WHERE NOT package.name = "model" RETURN modelClass AS ModelClass, package AS InvalidPackage

constraint.description: A bundle must not contain internal types which are not used by other types in the bundle.
constraint.cypher: match (bundle:Osgi:Bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(internalType:Type:Internal) where not ( (internalType)-[:ACTIVATES]->(bundle) or (bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(:Type)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(internalType) ) return bundle as Bundle, internalType as InternalType

constraint.description: All controller implementations must have a name suffix "Controller".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (controllerClass:Class:Controller) WHERE NOT controllerClass.name =~ ".*Controller" RETURN controllerClass AS ControllerClass

constraint.description: All JPA entities must be located in "model" packages.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(e:Jpa:Entity) WHERE NOT p.fqn =~ '.*\\.api\\.model' RETURN e.fqn as Entity

constraint.description: Verifies that all types are located in packages containing the group (groupId) and name (artifactId) of the Maven module.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (module:Maven)-[:CREATES]->(artifact:Artifact) WITH artifact, artifact.group + "\\." + artifact.name + "\\..*" as prefixPattern MATCH (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type) WHERE NOT type.fqn =~ prefixPattern RETURN type as TypeInInvalidPackage

constraint.description: There must be no cyclic type dependencies.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (p1:Package)-[:DEPENDS_ON*0..1]->(p2:Package), shortestPath((p2)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(p1)) WITH p1, p2 MATCH (p1)-[:CONTAINS]->(t1:Type), (p2)-[:CONTAINS]->(t2:Type), (t1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(t2), path=shortestPath((t2)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(t1)) WHERE NOT ( t1 = t2 OR (t1)-[:DECLARES]-(t2) ) RETURN LENGTH(path) AS Length, EXTRACT(p IN nodes (path) | p.fqn) AS Cycle

constraint.description: All controller implementations must be located in the package "model".
constraint.cypher: MATCH (package:PACKAGE)-[:CONTAINS]->(controllerClass:Class:Controller) WHERE NOT package.name = "controller" RETURN controllerClass AS ControllerClass, package AS InvalidPackage

constraint.description: All test methods must perform assertions (within a call hierarchy of max. 3 steps).
constraint.cypher: MATCH (testType:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(testMethod:Test:Method) WHERE NOT (testMethod)-[:INVOKES*..3]->(:Method:Assert) RETURN testType AS DeclaringType, testMethod AS Method

constraint.description: Internal types must not be public if no depending types exist in other packages of the bundle.
constraint.cypher: match (bundle:Osgi:Bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(internalType:Type:Internal), (internalPackage:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(internalType) optional match (bundle)-[:CONTAINS]->(otherPackage:Package), (otherPackage)-[:CONTAINS]->()-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(internalType) where internalType.visibility='public' with bundle, internalPackage, internalType, collect(otherPackage) as otherPackages where all(otherPackage in otherPackages where internalPackage = otherPackage) and not (internalType)-[:ACTIVATES]->(bundle) return bundle as Bundle, internalType as InternalType

constraint.description: All types in shopping cart module must only have dependencies to the user module.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (m1:Package:Module)-[:CONTAINS*0..]->(type1:Type), (m2:Package:Module)-[:CONTAINS*0..]->(type2:Type), (type1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(type2) WHERE m1<>m2 AND m1:ShoppingCart AND NOT ( m2:UserManagement ) RETURN type1.fqn as Dependent, m2.fqn as InvalidModuleDependency, type2.fqn as InvalidTypeDependency
